omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select 
	apc.NHSNumber, 
	max(apc.CDSActivityDate) as CDSActivityDate, 
	apc.CarerSupportIndicator,
	apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier
from omop_staging.sus_APC apc
where apc.CarerSupportIndicator is not null
	and apc.NHSNumber is not null
group by
	apc.NHSNumber, 
	apc.CarerSupportIndicator,
	apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier;

omopColumns.name: RecordConnectionIdentifier

dataSource.name: GeneratedRecordIdentifier
dataSource.description: CDS specific identifier that binds multiple CDS messages together.

omopColumns.query:
select 
	apc.NHSNumber, 
	max(apc.CDSActivityDate) as CDSActivityDate, 
	apc.CarerSupportIndicator,
	apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier
from omop_staging.sus_APC apc
where apc.CarerSupportIndicator is not null
	and apc.NHSNumber is not null
group by
	apc.NHSNumber, 
	apc.CarerSupportIndicator,
	apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier;

omopColumns.name: HospitalProviderSpellNumber

dataSource.name: HospitalProviderSpellNumber
dataSource.description: CDS specific hospital spell number that binds many episodes together.

omopColumns.query:

	apc.CarerSupportIndicator,

	and apc.NHSNumber is not null
group by
	apc.NHSNumber, 
	apc.CarerSupportIndicator,
	apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier;

omopColumns.name: observation_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `4224770`. Social support status

omopColumns.name: observation_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32818`. EHR administration record

omopColumns.name: value_as_string

dataSource.name: CarerSupportIndicator
dataSource.description: An indication of whether Carer support is available to the PATIENT at their normal residence.

omopColumns.query:
select 
	apc.NHSNumber, 
	max(apc.CDSActivityDate) as CDSActivityDate, 
	apc.CarerSupportIndicator,
	apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier
from omop_staging.sus_APC apc
where apc.CarerSupportIndicator is not null
	and apc.NHSNumber is not null
group by
	apc.NHSNumber, 
	apc.CarerSupportIndicator,
	apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier;
